title: Instant Noodles Diary
overview: Instant Noodles Diary is an off-the-beaten path, culinary road trip journeying across eight Asian countries and their diverse instant noodles foodscape. It explores how a single food product introduced half a century ago grew into a unique Asian dietary culture and a multi-billion-dollar industry. From instant noodle manufacturing plants to cosy caf√©s dishing up instant noodle specialities. Instant Noodles Diary brings you the diverse flavours, nuances and peculiarities of Asia, one cup at a time.
